hero.headline: Transform Your Future with
hero.subheadline: The most comprehensive Learning Management System built for modern education. Master new skills, connect with peers, and advance your career—all in one place.
hero.trustIndicators: No credit card required • Free forever plan • Cancel anytime

features.title: Everything You Need to Succeed
features.subtitle: LEAP PM provides a complete ecosystem for online learning with powerful features designed to engage students and empower instructors.

courseManagement.title: Comprehensive Course Management
courseManagement.description: Create, organize, and deliver engaging courses with sections, lessons, quizzes, and assignments. Support for video, text, and interactive content.

socialLearning.title: Social Learning Network
socialLearning.description: Connect with peers through posts, groups, and pages. Share knowledge, collaborate on projects, and build your professional network.

certificates.title: Certificates & Achievements
certificates.description: Earn verified certificates upon course completion. Track your achievements and showcase your skills to employers with unique verification codes.

chat.title: Real-time Chat & Collaboration
chat.description: Stay connected with instructors and classmates through real-time messaging. Get instant help and engage in meaningful discussions.

analytics.title: Advanced Analytics
analytics.description: Gain insights into learning progress, engagement metrics, and performance analytics. Make data-driven decisions to improve outcomes.

liveSessions.title: Live Sessions & Events
liveSessions.description: Schedule and attend live virtual sessions, webinars, and events. Support for online, in-person, and hybrid formats with integrated video conferencing.

jobBoard.title: Job Board Integration
jobBoard.description: Discover career opportunities tailored to your skills and learning path. Apply directly and track your applications in one place.

payments.title: Flexible Payment Options
payments.description: Support for one-time purchases, subscriptions, and flexible pricing models. Secure payment processing with multiple payment providers.

richMedia.title: Rich Media Support
richMedia.description: Upload and stream videos, share documents, and create interactive multimedia content. Cloud storage integration with S3-compatible services.

security.title: Enterprise-Grade Security
security.description: Built with security in mind. OAuth 2.0 authentication, role-based access control, audit logging, and data encryption.

howItWorks.title: How LEAP PM Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Start your learning journey in four simple steps

signUp.title: Sign Up
signUp.description: Create your free account in seconds. No credit card required to get started.

explore.title: Explore Courses
explore.description: Browse our extensive catalog of courses across various topics and skill levels.

learn.title: Learn & Engage
learn.description: Watch lessons, complete assignments, interact with peers, and track your progress.

certify.title: Get Certified
certify.description: Earn verified certificates and showcase your achievements to advance your career.

stats.title: Join a Thriving Community
stats.subtitle: Thousands of learners and instructors trust LEAP PM for their educational needs

testimonials.title: Loved by Thousands
testimonials.subtitle: See what our students and instructors have to say about their experience

sarah.name: Sarah Johnson
sarah.content: LEAP PM transformed how I learn new skills. The platform is intuitive, and the courses are incredibly well-structured. I earned three certifications in just two months!

michael.name: Michael Chen
michael.content: The best LMS I've used. The social learning features helped me connect with like-minded professionals, and the real-time chat made collaboration effortless.

emily.name: Emily Rodriguez
emily.content: As an instructor, LEAP PM gives me all the tools I need. The analytics help me understand my students better, and the platform handles everything from content delivery to payments.

david.name: David Park
david.content: I love the progress tracking and achievement system. It keeps me motivated, and the certificate verification feature has helped me land two job interviews!

jessica.name: Jessica Martinez
jessica.content: The job board integration is genius! I completed a course in Product Management and found my dream job through the platform. Highly recommend!

ryan.name: Ryan Thompson
ryan.content: LEAP PM is more than just a learning platform—it's a complete ecosystem. The community features, live sessions, and comprehensive course library are unmatched.
